professional.label: Professional
professional.description: Formal, credible language focusing on expertise and trust

casual.label: Casual
casual.description: Friendly, conversational language like talking to a friend

humorous.label: Humorous
humorous.description: Incorporate humor and wit to be memorable and entertaining

urgent.label: Urgent
urgent.description: Create urgency with time-limited offers, limited availability, or immediate benefits

luxury.label: Luxury
luxury.description: Emphasize premium quality, exclusivity, and sophistication

educational.label: Educational
educational.description: Focus on providing value through information, tips, or insights

inspirational.label: Inspirational

minimalist.label: Minimalist

openai.name: OpenAI GPT-4
openai.description: Best for long-form creative copy with natural language

claude.name: Anthropic Claude
claude.description: Logical, safe, follows brand guidelines strictly

openai.name: OpenAI DALL-E
openai.description: High-quality artistic images, great for abstract concepts

gemini.name: Google Gemini Imagen
gemini.description: Fast generation, good for product/lifestyle imagery

subnp.name: SubNP
subnp.description: Free unlimited generations, multiple style options

puter.name: Puter AI
puter.description: 35+ models, no limits, great for experimentation

step3.instruction: Select your preferred ad variation. Quality scores help you choose the best one!
step3.needsReview: Needs Review - Content truncated to meet Facebook limits

helpDialog.title: How Ad Quality Score Works
helpDialog.intro: Each variation is evaluated across four weighted pillars. Use this breakdown to understand what to improve.

compliance.title: Compliance (30 pts)
compliance.description: Checks Meta/Facebook limits and policy words so your ad can be published without surprises.
compliance.prohibitedWords: Penalties if banned or spammy phrases (e.g., 'free', 'click here') appear.

linguistic.title: Linguistic Quality (30 pts)
linguistic.description: Rewards clear structure and natural language regardless of English or Vietnamese.
linguistic.keywordDensity: Balanced keyword density (15-35%) shows topical focus without stuffing.
linguistic.readability: Short sentences (10-20 words) and 4-6 character words keep content digestible.
linguistic.grammar: Consistent capitalization, punctuation, and no excessive symbols.

persuasiveness.title: Persuasiveness (20 pts)
persuasiveness.description: Measures whether the ad motivates action with clear value.
persuasiveness.cta: +10 pts when an approved Call-To-Action button is set.
persuasiveness.powerWords: Power words (exclusive, premium, proven, etc.) boost urgency and credibility.

completeness.title: Completeness (20 pts)
completeness.description: Ensures all core fields are filled with meaningful copy.
completeness.headline: Headline: at least 10 characters for context.
completeness.descriptionField: Description: at least 20 characters to describe the offer.
completeness.primaryText: Primary text: at least 50 characters for story + benefits.

usage.title: How to use this score
usage.compare: Compare variations by total score and badge to pick the strongest one.
usage.focus: Use the suggestions chip to fix the lowest pillar first, then regenerate if needed.
usage.language: Regenerate in the language shown in the header to keep tone consistent.

helpDialog.languageNote: Quality score details follow your selected language (English or Vietnamese).

confirmSave.title: Confirm Save
confirmSave.message: Are you sure you want to save this ad variation?

unsavedVariations.title: Unsaved Ad Variations
unsavedVariations.message: You have newly generated ad variations that haven't been saved yet. Leave this page and the content will be lost.
unsavedVariations.highlightHint: We've highlighted the ad variations that still need to be saved.

extractionFailed.title: Content Extraction Failed
extractionFailed.message: We couldn't extract content from the provided ad links. Would you like to continue generating the ad with just your prompt, or go back to fix the links?

whatIsPrompt.title: What is a Prompt?
whatIsPrompt.description: A prompt is a description or instruction that tells the AI what kind of ad content you want to create. The more specific and detailed your prompt, the better the AI can understand your needs.

tip1.title: Describe Your Product/Service
tip1.description: Clearly explain what you're selling, its main benefits, and target audience.

tip2.title: Specify the Tone
tip2.description: Mention if you want the ad to be professional, casual, exciting, trustworthy, etc.

tip3.title: Include Key Features
tip3.description: List the most important features or benefits you want to highlight.

tip4.title: Mention Your Audience
tip4.description: Describe who your ideal customers are (age, interests, problems they face).

suggestions.title: üí° Suggestions for Improvement
suggestions.headlineTooLong: Headline uses {current} characters (max {max}). Shorten it to avoid truncation.
suggestions.descriptionTooLong: Description uses {current} characters (max {max}). Trim text for better delivery.
suggestions.primaryTextTooLong: Primary text uses {current} characters (max {max}). Remove filler sentences.
suggestions.prohibitedWord: Remove or rephrase the word "{word}" to comply with ad policies.
suggestions.improveReadability: Improve readability with shorter sentences and concrete benefits.
suggestions.addCTA: Add a clear Call-To-Action button to guide users.
suggestions.usePowerWords: Add credible power words (exclusive, premium, proven, etc.).
suggestions.addHeadline: Provide a descriptive headline so the ad feels complete.
suggestions.addDescription: Add a description (>= 20 characters) to support the offer.
suggestions.addPrimaryText: Add primary text (>= 50 characters) outlining the problem, solution, or offer.

validation.fixErrors: Please fix the validation errors above
validation.locationMinLength: Location must be at least 2 characters
validation.locationInvalidChars: Location can only contain letters, spaces, commas, and hyphens
validation.minAgeRange: Minimum age must be between 13 and 65
validation.maxAgeRange: Maximum age must be between 13 and 65
validation.minGreaterThanMax: Minimum age cannot be greater than maximum age
validation.narrowAgeRange: Age range is very narrow. Consider widening for better reach
validation.tooManyInterests: Too many interests may limit your reach. Consider focusing on top interests
validation.interestMinLength: Each interest must be at least 2 characters
